Title: PlanetX for Silverlight
Description:
PlanetX is a simple space strategy game. The goal is conquer all the enemy planets.

Instructions:

Select planet: left mouse button
Attack planet: right mouse button
Change fleet percent: mouse wheel

You can try the game:

[url=http://games.lidercfeny.hu/jatek.php?jatek_id=9]
